PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Testing CAPM model on developed and developing markets
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Testing the hypothesis that CAPM model is more closely followed in developed market vis-a-vis developing markets
A basket of 24 stock were selected in 3 different countries and various methods were tested to support the hypothesis
